entry.title: Aftershock
entry.summary:
Author: MrsM

Summary: Buck never expected his past to catch up with him. After years of trying to build a new life, an unexpected new recruit threatens to unravel everything. Secrets, regrets, and unexpected connections force him to face the wreckage he thought he left behind. But sometimes, the real impact isn‚Äôt in the first quake‚Äîit‚Äôs in the aftershock.orBuck has tried to forget his time in El Paso, but he is forced to remember when the 118 gets a new probie, Eddie Diaz.

entry.title: Dead Like Buck
entry.summary:
Author: LittleMilksuker

Summary: Death exists as a force of nature. Grim reapers collect souls. Buck is a reaper. The hows, whens, whos, whats and whys will be revealed as they come into fruition. This will not be in context, nor will canon be followed closely. In fact, I'd go so far as to say this will written as a significant "fuck you" to all things canon -- characters, actions taken, inaction -- in a hopefully darkly comical and satisfying way (assuming I finish this) that leaves the reader feeling catharsis when certain people bite it. I don't believe in justice but for the sake of this fic, bad karma, irony, murphy's law and graeveling machinations will come to pass. I don't know why or how they come up but I have gotten a kick out of a few Sentinel-Guide/9-1-1 mashups and thought a Dead Like Me lens might be cool.

entry.title: do you ever get homesick? (i can't get used to it)
entry.summary:
Author: thoughtyouintomylife

Summary: Eddie pulls him into a hug and Buck suddenly can‚Äôt hold it in anymore, the words coming up his throat like vomit. ‚ÄúEddie, I need to tell yo-‚Äù‚ÄúDon‚Äôt,‚Äù Eddie interrupts, not pulling away and instead squeezing him tighter. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt say it.‚ÄùBuck frowns in confusion, moving out of his grip to look him in the eyes. ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt even know what I-‚Äù‚ÄúI do know,‚Äù Eddie whispers, swallowing hard and looking down at the floor. ‚ÄúI know. But you can‚Äôt say it.‚ÄùBuck studies him carefully and it only takes him a few seconds to realize that Eddie does in fact know what he was going to say. ‚ÄúWhy not?‚Äù he whispers.‚ÄúBecause I‚Äôll say it back,‚Äù Eddie answers slowly. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll say it back because I do, and I don‚Äôt wanna do that to you, Buck. Not when I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going to...you deserve better than that.‚ÄùORBuck and Eddie grapple with knowing they‚Äôre in love and not being able to do anything about it.

entry.title: A job that slowly kills you, bruises that won't heal (I'll take a quiet life)
entry.summary:
Author: JasonToddsDevotedWife

Summary: ' Buck, speak of the devil, dropped down the last few feet. Bracing one foot against the rocky cliff and the other against the bumper, he secured his line and glanced up. The moment his eyes met Hondo‚Äôs, he faltered, foot slipping slightly against the rock.‚ÄúYou okay, kid?‚ÄùIt was impressive, the speed with which Buck recollected himself. Other than a slight downward quirk to his lips as though he had swallowed something sour, there was nothing on his face to tip off discomfort. An odd reaction, as far as he knew Buck had never met this man before. Eddie couldn‚Äôt help but furrow his brow. '¬†Evan "Buck" Buckley doesn't lie to his loved ones. At least, not any more than he needs to. He's made quite the life for himself at the 118 with people he loves and not a care in the world (at least, as far as anybody can tell) about his past before the 118. His past that he has historically been a bit vague about. When a blast from the past appears on a call, he is realizing that he might not have gotten away so scott-free from his past occupation. Cue Eddie noticing. Now, Buck has to navigate the collision between his past and his present.

entry.title: Keeping It Quiet
entry.summary:
Author: bellabrady

Summary: He can‚Äôt handle standing next to Eddie for however long it takes to clean the engine, he just can‚Äôt. He‚Äôs going to lose it. And he‚Äôs going to lose Eddie, too, because he‚Äôll inevitably either kiss him or confess his undying love. He can‚Äôt even guarantee he won‚Äôt just drop down on one knee and propose.‚ÄúOh, yeah, I‚Äôll be right there, Bobby!‚Äù Buck yells before dropping his rag into the bucket and taking off towards the loft, leaving Eddie standing there dumbfounded.‚ÄúBuck, no one was calling for you!‚Äù he shouts, exasperated. Buck ignores him and bounds up the stairs.‚ÄîOr: Buck realizes he's in love with Eddie shortly before a 24 hour shift. Out of fear of accidentally confessing his love, Buck tries to avoid him at all costs. If only Eddie wasn't so derermined to talk to him.

entry.title: Once More (With Feeling)
entry.summary:
Author: Strawberrywaltz

Summary: ‚ÄúI told him you could help.‚Äù Christopher says with such confidence that Eddie‚Äôs heart jumps into his throat. Because to Eddie, this isn‚Äôt a fight he can win. ‚ÄúPlease help him.‚Äù‚ÄúChristopher.‚Äù Eddie whispers and looks back down at the likely dying wild animal his son brought home.‚ÄúPlease?‚Äù Christopher‚Äôs eyes are wide and wet and looking at him with such hope.What can Eddie do? Say no? Of course not. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll try, but Mijo, it looks pretty hurt.‚Äù‚ÄúYou can save him.‚Äù Christopher insists. ‚ÄúI know you can.‚Äù__Or: Christopher saves a fox on a field trip that ends up not being a fox after all.

entry.title: Haunted by the ghost of you
entry.summary:
Author: Bumblebee2020

Summary: Evan Buckley has always been able to see ghosts, to the point if it weren't for his sister he would've been medicated.He meets Eddie Diaz when he's 22, they fall in love at 26, Eddie Diaz dies at 30 years old when a structure collapses."I can't see him Maddie, I...""Christopher?" Buck shakes his head as the weight in his chest grows. "You think maybe..."Buck shook his head harshly."No, he wouldn't without saying goodbye.... I haven't seen any of them since he died... it's like the world went quiet.""Buck..." Christopher whimpers as he walks into the living room. "I can't..."Buck nods and hugs him too, tight against his chest.~"I'm still here..."

entry.title: Shadows Of The Past
entry.summary:
Author: Queeny25

Summary: Buck struggles with his parents back in town. A little backstory, the Buckley parents were abusive but only to Buck, never Maddie she was their golden child. Maddie only found out about the abuse when she went to LA after running from Doug. Now in the present day Buck has made a family with the 118, and has an amazing boyfriend Eddie Diaz. Let‚Äôs see how Buck‚Äôs world gets turned upside down when he receives a text from Maddie stating that his parents are moving to LA.

entry.title: If I Could Take Us Back (If I Could Just Do That)
entry.summary:
Author: sleepless_nights_and_daydreams

Summary: ‚ÄúWill you write to me?‚Äù Chris asked out of nowhere as the credits rolled on the final episode.‚ÄúOf course buddy, you know you can text me or call me any time‚Äù Buck responded quizzically, leaning over Chris‚Äôs legs to grab the remote and pause the TV. Chris was starting to grow out of cuddling on the sofa, but he still liked the physical contact, so Buck was sat in the middle of the sofa while Chris laid with his legs in Bucks lap.‚ÄúNo I know that but‚Ä¶ no it‚Äôs stupid.‚Äù Chris mumbled in response.‚ÄúHey don‚Äôt say that, what's up?‚Äù Buck prompted ‚ÄúYou know you can talk to me about anything.‚Äù--Eddie moves to El Paso, and Buck and Chris decide they're going to write letters to each other as a fun way to keep in touch.Buck decides on his own to write Eddie letters at the same time, but these are one's he'll never actually send. Because you don't send your platonic best friend love letters written on pink love heart paper.Until you do.
